phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя довольно уставшим(ей).

translations.text: Today I feel quite tired.
This makes me a bit anxious.

phrases.pt: Não estou num bom dia hoje.
phrases.ru: Сегодня у меня не самый лучший день.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ʃˈtou nũ bõ ˈdiɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: I’m not having a good day today.
I feel calmer now.

phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈisu dɨˈjʃou mɨ ˈũ ˈpoku dɨʃkõfoɾˈtaβɛɫ

translations.text: That made me feel a bit uncomfortable.

phrases.pt: Estou a precisar de uma pausa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ɐ pɾɨsɐˈzaɾ dɨ ˈumɐ ˈpawzɐ

translations.text: I need a break.
This is stressing me out quite a lot.
Today I’m in a better mood.

phrases.pt: Preciso de ficar sozinho um pouco.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ fiˈkaɾ soˈziɲu ˈũ ˈpoku

translations.text: I need to be alone for a bit.

phrases.pt: Isto é emocionalmente pesado para mim.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɛ imosjõnɐɫˈmẽtɨ pɨˈzadu ˈpaɾɐ ˈmĩ

translations.text: This is emotionally heavy for me.

phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя немного перегруженным(ой).
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈsĩtu mɨ ˈũ ˈpoku soβɾɨkɐɾɨˈɡadu ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: Today I feel a bit overwhelmed.

phrases.pt: Estou bastante irritado com esta situação.
phrases.ru: Меня довольно сильно раздражает эта ситуация.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou bɐʃˈtɐ̃tɨ iʁiˈtadu kõ ˈeʃtɐ sitwɐˈsɐ̃w

translations.text: I’m quite irritated by this situation.

phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu dɨˈjʃou mɨ dɨ maw uˈmoɾ

translations.text: This put me in a bad mood.
I feel more confident now.
Today I’m particularly sensitive.
This made me quite frustrated.

phrases.pt: Estou a sentir muita pressão ultimamente.
phrases.ru: В последнее время я чувствую большое давление.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ɐ sĩˈtiɾ ˈmujtɐ pɾɐˈsɐ̃w uɫtimɐˈmẽtɨ

translations.text: Lately I’ve been feeling a lot of pressure.

phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя более позитивно.

translations.text: Today I feel more positive.
I need to calm down a bit.
This drained my energy.

phrases.pt: Sinto-me um pouco perdido com tudo isto.
phrases.ru: Я чувствую себя немного потерянным(ой) во всём этом.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈsĩtu mɨ ˈũ ˈpoku pɨɾˈdidu kõ ˈtudu ˈiʃtu

translations.text: I feel a bit lost with all of this.

phrases.pt: Hoje estou mais calmo do que ontem.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ ʃˈtou ˈmajʃ ˈkɐɫmu du kɨ õˈtẽj

translations.text: Today I’m calmer than yesterday.

phrases.pt: Isto afetou-me mais do que eu esperava.
phrases.ru: Это повлияло на меня сильнее, чем я ожидал(а).
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɐfɨˈtou mɨ ˈmajʃ du kɨ ˈew ʃpɨɾɐˈvɐ

translations.text: This affected me more than I expected.

phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя немного немотивированным(ой).
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈsĩtu mɨ ˈũ ˈpoku dɨʃmutiˈvadu ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: Today I feel a bit unmotivated.
I’m satisfied with the result.
This made me worried.

phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя эмоционально вымотанным(ой).

translations.text: Today I feel emotionally drained.
I feel relieved after that.

phrases.ru: Это сделало меня ещё более растерянным(ой).

translations.text: This made me even more confused.
Today I have little patience.

phrases.pt: Sinto-me um pouco inseguro em relação a isso.
phrases.ru: Я чувствую некоторую неуверенность по этому поводу.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈsĩtu mɨ ˈũ ˈpoku ĩsɨˈɡuɾu ẽ ʁɨlɐˈsɐ̃w ɐ ˈisu

translations.text: I feel a bit insecure about this.
This made me quite happy.

phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя более уравновешенно.

translations.text: Today I feel more balanced.

phrases.pt: Estou um pouco tenso neste momento.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ʃˈtou ˈũ ˈpoku ˈtẽsu ˈneʃtɨ muˈmẽtu

translations.text: I’m a bit tense right now.
This really affected me.

phrases.pt: Sinto-me mais tranquilo depois de falar.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈsĩtu mɨ ˈmajʃ tɾɐ̃ˈkilu dɨˈpojʃ dɨ fɐˈlaɾ

translations.text: I feel calmer after talking.
Today I’m feeling better.
This made me emotionally tired.

phrases.pt: Sinto-me mais confiante com o tempo.
phrases.ru: Со временем я чувствую себя увереннее.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈsĩtu mɨ ˈmajʃ kõfjɐ̃ˈtɨ kõ u ˈtẽpu

translations.text: Over time I feel more confident.

phrases.pt: Hoje não me sinto muito bem.
phrases.ru: Сегодня я чувствую себя не очень хорошо.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ nɐ̃w mɨ ˈsĩtu ˈmũjtu bẽ

translations.text: Today I don’t feel very well.
